roleset.name: supervise, control
roleset.note: MANAGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'manage' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. (from manage.01-v predicate notes)
MANAGEMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on manage-v.01. No corresponding Vncls. (from management.01-n)

example.name: occupation
example.text: Standard Life Assurance Co. manages about #15 billion in UK institutional funds.
example.arg: about #15 billion in UK institutional funds.

example.name: medical
example.text: [How]-1 do we best manage this brain injury which is increasing in pressure *t*-1?
example.arg: this brain injury which is increasing in pressure

example.name: just arg0
example.text: one could do just fine without professional management

roleset.name: scrape by, accomplish by extraordinary means
roleset.note: MANAGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'manage' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. (from manage.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: NP deed
example.text: The French filmmaker Claude Chabrol has managed another kind of weird achievement with his "Story of Women".
example.arg: another kind of weird achievement with his "Story of Women".

example.name: VP deed
example.text: Wilder has managed *trace* to get across the idea that Coleman will say anything to get elected.
example.arg: *trace* to get across the idea that Coleman will say anything to get elected.

roleset.name: able to be controlled
roleset.note: MANAGEABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8, relation to 'manage.01'. (from manageable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: He complains of some belly pain , but that is manageable .

roleset.name: accomplishable, but only by barely scraping by
roleset.note: MANAGEABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia, relation to magage.02 (from manageable.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Getting through airport security in time for my flight is just not manageable.
example.arg: Getting through airport security in time for my flight
